phrases: Is it a good idea to send me into battle?
If I die, the Deucalion's Aldnoah will shut down.
But we will worry about that when we have to.
Do you want to be removed from the front lines, Ensign Kaizuka?
King to F6, king takes queen.
I will put it on the monitor.
Did you come up with that move yourself?
Or is it something that analytical engine of yours cooked up?
I am assigning tasks to unused brain cells to try to optimize its processing.
So it is both the device's suggestion and my own idea at the same time.
This ship and her crew both owe you our lives.
If you want to fight, I think we should support that.
I do not deserve any special treatment.
Did you hear that Aldnoah activation tests were conducted
using blood samples that had been drawn from the princess?
Blood alone was not sufficient for Aldnoah activation.
So you could be considered a special case indeed, Ensign.
When you resuscitated the princess, the activation factor transferred to...
Then it was fully activated when you came into contact with royal blood.
Over the past ten months or so,
we have obtained plenty of intel on Aldnoah and their Kataphrakts.
But they still have the overwhelming edge in military strength.
There is no guarantee that we will win if we keep on fighting.
But if we do, Ensign Kaizuka...
I will put my money on you.
I will leave that to your imagination.
I suppose not even the Tharsis can see that far into the future.
I clustered my shots in the region that you calculated, Mr. Harklight.
Let us pray that they will not be influenced by some unexpected wind.
Ah, I thought I smelled something.
A rather grubby one, at that.
I rushed here so that I might join in the battle as well.
If he has given some offense, I offer my apologies.
However, if this treatment is unwarranted,
it will not go well for you.
If this Terran were merely your pet, it would be eccentric, but tolerable.
But to appoint him a knight?
Is that not taking your game too far?
Count Barouhcruz, it is not your place to offer opinions regarding my vassals.
Perhaps, but him fighting alongside us is another matter entirely!
One cannot take to the field of battle
with someone who might turn traitor at any moment!
If that is your concern, please strike me down right here.
If I go into battle with you,
it might very well be me who is attacked from behind.
By the grace of the emperor of Vers,
I name Slaine Troyard my son right here and now.
All of you here are my witnesses!
From this day forth, you are my son.
Will you raise a hand to him even now, Count Marylcian?
If you are prepared to go to such lengths, so be it.
But if his behavior is the least bit suspicious, I will put him down without mercy.
I have put you in an awkward position.
I had decided to do this long ago.
I, too, take to the field of battle.
I must have a successor just in case.
From now on, think of me as your father.
This puts you one step closer to your dream.
I do not have any dreams.
Who do you think will win, Eddelrittuo?
Th-The glorious Vers Imperial Forces will emerge victorious, of course!
You have friends aboard a United Earth Forces ship, do not you?
Let us have a wager, then.
If the Vers Empire wins, I bet...
What are you dreaming of right now, sister?
High rate of attack evasion reported.
A good luck charm given to me by a dear Terran friend when we arrived on Earth.
Animals that fly through the air...
It is just as you said, Slaine!
Is he equipped with a neuro-linked analytical engine too?
But I do not have enough data.
It dodged my attacks as though it could see the future.
If that is true... it could be a problem.
The warrior god Odin, rider of the mythological, eight-legged Sleipnir,
drank of the waters of MImisbrunnr and was granted vast wisdom.
But the price he paid for that wisdom was his left eye.
Do not make fun of me!
After the battle in Russia, I wanted off the ship.
But then it hit me that if I did, I would never be able to look Okojo in the eye when I do die.
If your steed is ever acting up, come see me day or night.
I will fix it up in a flash.
I will hold you to that.
Okay, why do not we grab a bite before the battle?
When I was shot, my stomach was empty, apparently.
They say I would have died if my organs had been contaminated by stomach contents.
But I might not get another chance, so maybe some tea.
He is got a 1 through 3, a 10 for emergencies, and one on the left and right.
It is specced out for high-G pivots.
Long, thin wires are not cut out for that.
So you are the Aldnoah unit that everybody's talking about, huh?
I hear one of you is a Martian.
Do not get in our way on the battlefield, little ladies.
I know that better than anyone.
You have got the tsun part down pat.
I wish you would show a little more dere, though.
I am going to deck you.
We will enter defense airspace in 30 minutes.
Slaine Troyard, launching in the Tharsis.
We will provide support for the attack platoons as a guerrilla force.
Our shipboard Kataphrakts are launching from Trident Base.
They cannot hit us in this wind, anyway!
Hit them when they get in close!
Hit them when they get in close...
Hit them when they get in close...
I am fine, but the debris is not!
I cannot get a clear shot with all this shaking!
Stop pulling crazy stunts, darn it!
I would not be able to use it in a dogfight anyway.
Base will make next approach in 30 seconds!
Get clear of our line of fire!
Crap, I have got one on my six!
No friendly units in line of fire!
Issue disengage order to attack platoons and guerrilla unit!
Inaho, we have been ordered to disengage!
I knew it, he is using predictions, too.
I will wait until the instant he comes out of the rocks.
He will attack the instant I come out from the rocks.
Looking for the gap in my barrier?
I took the liberty of changing its location.
Prepare to meet your maker, Terran!
The flames are not being sucked in!
I picked up a debris cloud closing in at high speed on my 3D Doppler radar.
and I would have been caught in it, too.
My Dioscuria, brought low by mere debris?!
I fired them off before the battle began.
They were aimed so that they would swing around the Earth
and land at that spot right now.
I had originally meant it as a trap to defeat Inaho Kaizuka.
The trick was to disable your dimensional barrier,
but I thought that if anyone could manage it, it was him.
Did you honestly believe that I would swear fealty to you?
To the man who pulled the trigger against Princess Asseylum?!
Did you think I would forgive you?!
My second volley will arrive soon.
On this day, I have lost my second father.
He was also a great man who devoted his life
to the prosperity of the Vers Empire.
I hereby announce my resolve to carry on both my fathers' legacy
and fight for the even greater prosperity of the Vers Empire.
Lords of the Vers Orbital Knights.
This is no time to be squabbling amongst each other.
As knights of the noble Vers Empire, should we not work
hand in hand to eradicate Earth's resistance forces?
In the name of Her Imperial Highness Asseylum Vers Allusia!
Let us punish the Terrans who dare defy the Vers Empire!
Her Highness Asseylum is biding her time at our lunar base!
In hopes that she may remain
Mr. Harklight, you were born into the third class, were not you?
Though they were poor and of a low class,
my father and mother worked hard to raise me
and used every means at their disposal so that I could serve the Orbital Knights.
Milord Slaine, it is for that reason that I have the utmost respect for you.
You, who have attained the rank of count even though you are a Terran.
This new era will be for people like us.
